title: Alpha Headline Cousins
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for fonts that are similar looking to Alpha Headline - similar in the modern techy feel, and also sophisticated and restrained. [http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307113601/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")

Thanks,

Tal
